title: Research data quality: LSP-input, NotebookEdit-input, TodoWrite-input
description: Analyze samples of LSP-input, NotebookEdit-input, TodoWrite-input. For each type: extract samples, score relevance, recommend handling strategy.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Paper 1 (LSP-input): Extract 5+ samples of 'LSP-input' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 1 (LSP-input): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
Paper 2 (NotebookEdit-input): Extract 5+ samples of 'NotebookEdit-input' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 2 (NotebookEdit-input): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
Paper 3 (TodoWrite-input): Extract 5+ samples of 'TodoWrite-input' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 3 (TodoWrite-input): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
